name: hlphl

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, ccph))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c0 ∈ PreHil, c0 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cphl))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccph))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cphl))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cphl))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccph))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cphl))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cphl))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cphl))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ PreHil)

comment: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is an inner product space (also called a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
